title: Sotol Romo Founder on Launch, Bad Bunny
description: Claudia Romo Edelman, founder of Sotol Romo, discusses the launch of the ultra-premium Mexican spirit and Bad Bunny headlining the Super Bowl halftime show. She speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on "The Close." (Source: Bloomberg)
